item.title: iEAR Presents! “Turn the Light Around”: 16mm Plant Processed Performance and Films by Le Ratoire | Sept. 20
item.description: Join us September 20 at 7pm at The Sanctuary for Independent Media for screenings of 16mm plant-processed performance films, presented by Katherine Bauer and Joyce Lainé, members of the film collective Le Ratoire and Atelier MTK. The image sin each film emerge before our eyes through the process of a developer composed of plants, ashes, and water. The screening will be followed by Q&A. This event is co-sponsored by iEAR Presents and The Sanctuary for Independent Media.

item.title: National Hazing Prevention Week | Sept. 22-26
item.description: Date: Monday, September 22, 2025 - Fri , September 26, 2025 (all day) - RPI Won’t Stand By! September 22nd - September 26th is National Hazing Prevention Week. Multiple areas of campus will be hosting events to build community, uplift healthy groups, and raise awareness to prevent hazing. Stop by one or more of our events! For more information, contact Lauryn Maleski or Mel Daley.

item.title: RPI Finance Conference 2025 | Oct. 1 (Register by Sept. 22)
item.description: We’re excited to announce the second annual RPI Finance Conference on October 1, 2025. Come explore a curated lineup of interactive sessions designed to advance your professional skills and deepen your understanding of critical topics in higher education. From finance and data to leadership and AI, there’s something for every learner. The registration deadline is September 22, 2025.

item.title: iEAR Presents! Le Ratoire Plant Processing Workshop | Sept. 20
item.description: In this workshop, Le Ratoire artist collective will work with participants to learn how to make black & white film/photo developer using just local plants, ashes, and water. No industrial products, nothing from the store! We will go over the techniques of photograms (also known as rayograms) and phytography, two ways of exposing and making images on photo paper without needing to use a camera. Join us September 20 at 2pm at the NATURE Lab at the Sanctuary for Independent Media.

item.title: RPI Faculty and Staff In-Person Workshop: Talk Smart, Teach Strong: Sharpening Your Academic Presentation Skills | Oct. 1
item.description:
Date: Wednesday, October 1, 2025 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM - This session aims to strengthen academic presentation and facilitation skills, combining elements of presentation best practices with effective teaching strategies. You will explore techniques to enhance voice, presence, and impact in the classroom, while also engaging in train-the-trainer methods to foster active student participation. Please register by 9-29 using the Event URL in the See section of the calendar event.
